title: 4.1 Master Challenge 1
question:
The sales of a company for two consecutive years is mentioned in the following table.
1. Prepare a presentation and add a title slide.
2. Add another slide and insert a column chart based on the data in the table given above.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java
